backstories.clan_founder: m_c is one of the founding members of the Clan.

backstories.kittypet3: m_c used to be a kittypet. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} got lost after wandering away, and when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} returned home, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Twolegs were gone. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} eventually found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way to the Clan.

backstories.rogue1: m_c joined the Clan by choice after living life as a rogue.

backstories.abandoned2: m_c was born outside of the Clan, but was brought to the Clan as a kit and has lived here ever since.
backstories.abandoned3: m_c was born into another Clan, but {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/were/was} left here as a kit for the Clan to raise.
backstories.abandoned4: m_c was found and taken in after being abandoned by {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Twolegs as a kit.
